Name: Captain Carter & The Hydra Stomper
Description: Exciting play possibilities for Marvel fans!¬Kids can recreate action from the animated Disney+ TV series What If...? and play out new stories from the Marvel Universe.¬The perfect gift for young superheroes¬Marvel fans who enjoy creating new stories with iconic superhero characters will love this imaginative playset.¬LEGO® Marvel Captain Carter & The Hydra Stomper¬Opening cockpit¬Enter the mech and let the action begin!¬Cool weapons¬Use stud shooters to defeat Red Skull.¬Exciting battles¬Red Skull fights back with his stud shooter.¬Enjoyable building experience¬This awesome construction set helps to develop the creative and cognitive skills of Marvel movie fans aged 8 and up.¬Iconic Marvel characters¬This versatile playset puts popular action heroes from Disney+ TV’s What If...? series into young Marvel fans’ hands.
